The function below copies a Github actions workflow file into the `.github/workflows/run-pipeline.yaml`:

```{r function-nix_github_actions}
#' nix_github_actions
#' @return Nothing, copies file to a diretory.
#'
nix_github_actions <- function(){
dir_create(dirname(file.path(".github", "workflows", "run-pipeline.yaml"))
  source <- system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "run-pipeline.yaml"),
    package = "rix",
    mustWork = TRUE
  )
  file.copy(source, path, overwrite = TRUE)
  invisible()
}
```
